definition: to approve and carry out/to issue approval
to ascertain/to act on/to criticize/to pass on/classifier for batches, lots, military flights/tier (for the ranking of universities and colleges)
to do/to manage/to handle/to go about/to run/to set up/to deal with

sentences.english: Hand feel slightly softer than approved sample.

definition: to approve and forward/to endorse/stamp "approved for distribution"
to return to one's original trade/to put (a business etc) under the administration of the relevant central authority/(the) relevant (department in charge of sth)
to write comments on a report submitted by a subordinate/written comments from a superior
to accept to hear a case/to handle (a service)
to register (to an official organism)/to file a case (for investigation)
to report to higher authorities through layers of hierarchy
to report for criticism/to submit for approval to higher authority
